GSD.description:
nvme: fix multipath crash caused by flush request when blktrace is enabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit f13301a69ababa6c2236fb4f0393b7e914e7e1e0. For more details please see the references link.
